item.title: The war is over, Trump says, on a historic day for the Middle East
item.description: Trump arrived in Tel Aviv earlier Monday to mark the release of Israeli hostages by Hamas after more than two years in captivity.

item.title: Pam Bondi and DHS embrace SNL spoof of her and Kristi Noem: 'Loving Amy Poehler!'
item.description: The "Saturday Night Live" skit spoofed Pam Bondi's stonewalling, Kristi Noem's history of killing a dog, and President Donald Trump's preferred hair c...

item.title: China 'not afraid of trade war,' accuses U.S. of 'double standard' for rare earths retaliation
item.description: U.S. stocks lost $2 trillion after President Trump said he would impose new tariffs on imports from China in retaliation for rare earth export control...

item.title: Trump warns Russia he may send Ukraine long-range Tomahawks if Moscow doesn't settle war soon
item.description: President Donald Trump on Sunday warned Russia that he may send Ukraine long-range Tomahawk missiles if Moscow doesn't settle its war there soon.

item.title: Government shutdown: Vance says 'fraud' is rife in ACA tax credits use
item.description: Democrats want any government funding bill include an extension for enhanced Obamacare subsidies, which are set to expire at the end of this year.
